channel.title: ••Bloodfire-RS!••
channel.description:
[center][size=15pt]Hello[/size] [size=15pt]Mopar![/size][/center] [center]I'm Crusix, from Bloodfire-wow. We have decided, to also make a Runescape private server. Bloodfire is an extremely huge private server company, with over 250 staff so far. We are now looking for the coders for a Runescape private server. I will be the leader for the RS server, and I'm looking for staff.[/center] [center]Current Staff Positions: [b] Head Developer Three Java Coders Head Web Designer Three Web Designers Assistant Manager Five Moderators Ten Beta Testers [/b][/center] [center]To apply for staff, here are the requirements for each different position: [b]Java Coder[/b]; Need at least one year experience, high dedication, and a minimum age of 16. [b]Head Developer[/b]; Need at least three years in experience, have previous work sites ready to show. Need to heavily know Java and other languages can help you get this position. Need to be at least 18 years of age. [b]Web Designer[/b]; Need to understand at least two of the following, PHP, CSS, HTML, XHTML. Need to be atleast 15 years of age, have following projects ready to show. [b]Head Web Designer[/b]; Need to understand PHP, CSS, MySQL, HTML, XHTML. Need to be atleast 18 years of age, and understand all the above and flash design. [b]Assistant Manager[/b]: This job will pretty much be my assistant, which you will make sure everything is going well and keeping stuff organized. Requirements for this job are; Need to be extremely organized. Able to keep up with the community, which will consist of thousands of people. Need to be very mature and a minimum age of 15.[/center] [center]If your one of the best developers around here, why should you apply? Well, you should apply because first of all, this isn't a joke. You will be payed, each month. How much will you be payed? It just depends how much is done. We're not looking for people that just want some cash, I want people who are dedicated to coding Runescape servers, and have a lot of experience with them. Why start with so many staff? If you knew how much work is being done with the World of Warcraft server, you would know. We are under constant development there, and it needs to be the same way for the Runescape server. We need about 25-40 staff to start for this project, and need them now. So if you are looking to be apart of the next generations biggest private server community, here is your chance. [/center] [center]To Apply: Please copy and email the following code.
Real Name: Real Age: Position I'm Applying For: Experience in this previously: Why should I be picked: Email: Where I found this:
ALL Emails, please send either via private message here, or emails. To E-Mail Crusix, it's Crusix@live.com Hurry while positions are available! [/center]

item.title: ••Bloodfire-RS!••
item.dc:creator: @Crusix Crusix
item.description:
@Crusix wrote:

[center][size=15pt]Hello[/size] [size=15pt]Mopar![/size][/center]

[center]I’m Crusix, from Bloodfire-wow. We have decided, to also make a Runescape private server. Bloodfire is an extremely huge private server company, with over 250 staff so far. We are now looking for the coders for a Runescape private server. I will be the leader for the RS server, and I’m looking for staff.[/center]

[center]Current Staff Positions:
Head Developer
Three Java Coders
Head Web Designer
Three Web Designers
Assistant Manager
Five Moderators
Ten Beta Testers
[/center]

[center]To apply for staff, here are the requirements for each different position:
Java Coder; Need at least one year experience, high dedication, and a minimum age of 16.
Head Developer; Need at least three years in experience, have previous work sites ready to show. Need to heavily know Java and other languages can help you get this position. Need to be at least 18 years of age.
Web Designer; Need to understand at least two of the following, PHP, CSS, HTML, XHTML. Need to be atleast 15 years of age, have following projects ready to show.
Head Web Designer; Need to understand PHP, CSS, MySQL, HTML, XHTML. Need to be atleast 18 years of age, and understand all the above and flash design.
Assistant Manager: This job will pretty much be my assistant, which you will make sure everything is going well and keeping stuff organized. Requirements for this job are; Need to be extremely organized. Able to keep up with the community, which will consist of thousands of people. Need to be very mature and a minimum age of 15.[/center]

[center]If your one of the best developers around here, why should you apply? Well, you should apply because first of all, this isn’t a joke. You will be payed, each month. How much will you be payed? It just depends how much is done. We’re not looking for people that just want some cash, I want people who are dedicated to coding Runescape servers, and have a lot of experience with them. Why start with so many staff? If you knew how much work is being done with the World of Warcraft server, you would know. We are under constant development there, and it needs to be the same way for the Runescape server. We need about 25-40 staff to start for this project, and need them now. So if you are looking to be apart of the next generations biggest private server community, here is your chance. [/center]

[center]To Apply: Please copy and email the following code.

Real Name: Real Age: Position I'm Applying For: Experience in this previously: Why should I be picked: Email: Where I found this:
ALL Emails, please send either via private message here, or emails. To E-Mail Crusix, it's Crusix@live.com Hurry while positions are available! [/center]

Read full topic
